front.title: Secure UAS Network RID and C2 Transport

abstract.t: This document defines a transport mechanism for Unmanned Aircraft System (UAS) Network Remote ID (N-RID). CoAP/CBOR is used for the N-RID messaging. This is secured via either HIP/ESP or DTLS. HIP/ ESP or DTLS secure messaging Command-and-Control (C2) for is also described.
